title: EcoCentro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Take-out, European, Spanish
description: Established 1993, a combination vegetarian deli and health food store with a full service restaurant in the basement. Food is mostly vegan and changes. Shop sells a small selection of organics; soy milk and rice milk; soy analogs such as tempeh; plus various herbal remedies, incense, New Age books, jewelry, and imported goods. Also hosts classes. After renovation in 2012, the deli, restaurant, and health food shop have separate street entrances (side by side). Near metros Rio Rosas and Cuatro Caminos.
